org.xmlunit.xpath

类 JAXPXPathEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xmlunit.xpath.JAXPXPathEngine
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    XPathEngine

    public class JAXPXPathEngine
extends Object
implements XPathEngine
    Simplified access to JAXP's XPath API.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      JAXPXPathEngine()
      Create an XPathEngine that uses JAXP's default XPathFactory under the covers.
      JAXPXPathEngine(XPathFactory fac)
